p.k: Horror, Sci-fi Usa (1959). Hrají: Bill Ash, Carl Anthony, David De Mering, Dudley Manlove, Duke Moore, Gregory Walcott, Joanna Lee, John Breckinridge, Lyle Talbot, Mona McKinnon, Norma McCarty, Paul Marco, Reverend Lynn Lemon, Tom Keene, Tor Johnson. Režie: Edward D. Wood Jr..
p.d: Aliens resurrect dead humans as zombies and vampires to stop human kind from creating the Solaranite (a sort of sun-driven bomb).
